content: is someone familiar with the trademark policy of FHIR? If i want to release a piece of open-source software with the name XXXXfhir would this be a problem. I just read the https://www.hl7.org/fhir/license.html statements and i'm not sure aboute the definition of "product" and if only "FHIR" is protecteded and "fhir" is fine?
protection is not case sensitive. You need to ask permission
